name: V_EHI_PBI_PB_INVOICE_GRP_TTL
description: This view filters out invoice data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing invoice.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter for the group on the invoice.

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the employer group associated with the invoice.

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: GROUP_TOTAL
columns.description: Total amount for the group on the invoice.
